H0.text: What is harvested from Hevea brasiliensis, whose other plant names separately feature the words Para and India. Rubber

H1.text: What is harvested from Hevea brasiliensis, whose other plant names separately feature the words Para and India. Seeds

H2.text: What is harvested from Hevea brasiliensis, whose other plant names separately feature the words Para and India. Timber

H3.text: What is harvested from Hevea brasiliensis, whose other plant names separately feature the words Para and India. Latex

A4.text: The milky latex extracted from the tree is the primary source of natural rubber.

A5.text: The wood has been harvested for furniture making.
